name: Towers Pass
description:
Towers Pass is a Metroidvania-style type game. The point of this game is to explore and to unlock abilities through traversing the map.

Explore areas of the map by unlocking abilities such as double jumping and wall climbing.

Talk to NPCs for tasks and missions. Left-click on the question mark above them in order to start the dialogue.

Unlock items that can boost your stats. These items are known as "charms", and can make you run faster or jump higher.

Use items to get past certain stages of the map.

This game is still in early development, and I will be trying to update this game once every few months because high school will be starting for me soon. Have fun with this game!

Please know that this is the first game I have fully ever released, please leave any feedback on how I did, and on how this game can be improved! This game took around 1 year for me to create. I made everything by myself, with art borrowed from @pixelfrog and @o_lobster.
